column5: Gated Estate in the heart of DFW metroplex. We are 8-10 mins away from DFW Airport, 30 mins from Love Field airport. Located within minutes from Dallas & Fort Worth, American Airlines Center, AT&T Six Flags, Grapevine Gaylord, Great Wolf Lodge, Grapevine Mills Mall, Historic Downtown Grapevine, Texas Motor Speedway  Bedroom and Den with a mini-kitchen and spa-style bathroom. Our other listing the QUIET COZY ROOM
